text: M51 or M-51 may refer to: * M-51 (Michigan highway), a state highway in Michigan * M51 highway (Russia) * M51 Skysweeper, an anti-aircraft gun * M51 MACI mine * M51 SLBM, a French nuclear ballistic missile * BMW M51, a 1991 straight-6 Diesel engine * Sherman M-51, an Israeli modification of American M4 Sherman tank * Eidgen√∂ssischer Stutzer 1851, a historical service rifle of the Swiss Army * Messier 51, a spiral galaxy also known as the Whirlpool Galaxy
title: M51
